activities.name: create_watermark_table
activities.description: create table for metadata driven data ingestion.

scripts.text:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[watermark_table](
	[source_table_id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[source_SQL_keyvault_connection_string] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[source_db_name] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[source_schema_name] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[source_table_name] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[source_load_type] [varchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[source_pk_columns] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[source_select_columns] [varchar](max) NULL,
	[source_watermark_column] [varchar](255) NULL,
	[source_load_frequency] [int] NULL,
	[source_is_active] [tinyint] NULL,
	[destination_partition_by] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[destination_zorder_by] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[destination_landing_watermark] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[destination_bronzing_watermark] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[last_etl_timestamp] [datetime] NULL,
	[last_pipeline_run_id] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[current_pipeline_run_id] [varchar](50) NULL
 CONSTRAINT [UniqueTables] UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED 
(
	[source_db_name] ASC,
	[source_schema_name] ASC,
	[source_table_name] ASC
)WITH (STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY]

;
INSERT INTO [dbo].[watermark_table]
(            [source_db_name]
      ,[source_schema_name]
      ,[source_table_name]
      ,[source_load_type]
	  ,[source_watermark_column]
      ,[source_pk_columns]
      ,[source_select_columns]
      ,[source_is_active]
      ,[source_load_frequency]

	  )
VALUES
('altro_data','dbo','employee','Full','modified_date','employee_id','*',1,NULL),
('altro_data','dbo','worklog','Full','modified_date','worklog_id','*',1,1440)

DROP TABLE [altro_data_example].[person];
CREATE TABLE [altro_data_example].[person](
	[person_id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[person_name] [varchar](250) NULL,
    [title] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [description] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[gender_id] [int] NULL,
    [birth_date] [datetime] NULL,
    [is_active] [int] NULL,
	[start_date] [datetime] NULL,
	[end_date] [datetime] NULL,
    [modified_date] DATETIME NULL DEFAULT GETDATE()
	
)
;

INSERT INTO [altro_data_example].[person]
(      [person_name]
      ,[title]
	  ,[description]
      ,[gender_id]
      ,[birth_date]
      ,[is_active]
      ,[start_date]

	  )
VALUES
('eirik','kung','more usefull information',1,'1986-01-01',1,'2022-01-01'),
('egil','sportsidiot','more usefull informatio',1,'1986-01-01',1,'2022-01-01')
